name: Beanstronauts
description:
Beanstronauts is a horror game inspired by the game "among us", you are a leader of a spaceship and you have to figure out the murderers of your crewmates and kill them while keeping your ship stable. however, your crewmates will move around the ship to do their tasks in an endless loop, which makes it harder for you to detect the murderer. and if all of your crewmates die, you are left alone with the mercy of the murderers!

this game also features LAN lobbies where 2 players can join the same game if they are connected to the same network

Controls: -WASD for movement
          -"E" for picking up your tool
          -LEFT CLICK to kill the target using your tool

Objective: find all the secret murderers and kill them!

YT channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCvHyRF4fwSuQYy6_sHKwlBg?view_as=subscriber
